column4: When I bootup my ubantu, it does not go stright into the the grapical mode, but it says "Brezzy badge" and ask me login under a command shell, whats wrong?
what is wrong is your using something that isn't released yet.  please ask in #ubuntu+1 so they can help you either debug it or point you to where you can post on bug tracker
my appologies for some reason i thought you were using dapper ... nm, stick around someone might know
tell us where exactly it is stuck?
I think its not loading the grapical stuff on boot up, I am getting ready to check the boot process see if I disabled anything I should not have
your able to log in via command line?
yeah
I think I might have found my problem
then your allright.  debugging this can be hard as it can be anything
Whats the login shell for the GUI?
login is loging for your account, it doesn't matter how you login, l/p is always the same
I am on kubantu btw
just login using your login name and pass you created at install
your loging in your account, it makes no difference whether you use shell interface, kde interface or some futurama parapsychic interface :0
then why do I get a command line when I login?
what? do you get a graphical login menu or do you get a black screen (shell) login menu?
it sounds like it confuses you too
okay stop talking and start listening a bit
or ask more specific questions about solving the problem
i'm done :)
no error messages
did you restard kdm?
I can't read all the posts... 2 many of them :(
lol :)
